title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Any suggestions? Best otc mininal If not all questions asked hussle Free crypto exchanging lowest Fees and no tax ?Is Dubai and Portugal ? What about UK Are there any OTC offices to exchange crypto?

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Some exchanges offer OTC services without asking too many questions but you would have to KYC, if you don't like that hit me up and I can help for a very low fee.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Do you try already P2P of the exchange? Bisq offer a decentralized P2P which you can directly cash out your BTC without the need to undergo KYC but Binance and other centralized exchange offer the lowest fee which is free. The tax vary per country but most of the 3rd world country donâ€™t charge tax on P2P transaction.

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: I think the safest way to buy crypto hussle free is via P2P for now. Most Big/Old centralised Exchanges support P2P with different kinds of coins. I use MEXC Global exchange everytime because Its faster and easier for me there and its supports most of the coins I do buy. Also, withdrawal fees are very cheap there. Maybe you should give P2P a try.
